general_detail/school/image_school_name: Take Photo of main school sign
general_detail/verification/verified: Verify EMIS School Name and School EMIS
general_detail/general_detail_1/number_p: 1.7) Number of Pupils that attend the school
1.8) If number not known, estimated number of pupils that attend the school
general_detail/gps_coordinates: 1.12) GPS Coordinates [latitude x.yº, longitude x.yº altitude m, accuracy m]
general_detail/weather_condition: 1.13) Weather Condition on day of survey
exposure/exposure_1/travel_time_to_build: Travel time to nearest source of building material (in hours) on foot/walking
Travel time to nearest source of building material (in hours) on motorbike
Travel time to nearest source of building material (in hours) on car
Travel time to nearest source of building material (in hours) on truck/tractor
Travel time to nearest source of building material (in hours) by other means
exposure/exposure_2/travel_time_to_major: Travel time to nearest local sand source (in hours) on foot/walking
Travel time to nearest local sand source (in hours) on motorbike
Travel time to nearest local sand source (in hours) on car
Travel time to nearest local sand source (in hours) on truck/tractor
exposure/exposure_3/distance_river: 2.3) Distance of site away from river/body of water (in meters)
flooding/exposure_4/risk_of_flooding: 2.4) Is the site at risk of flooding?
flooding/flooding_risk/last_flood_event: 2.4.1) If yes, is there a history of flooding when was the Last flood event (year-BS)
flooding/flooding_risk/exposure_5/flood_: 2.4.2) If there is a flooding risk, what is Maximum historical flood height (in meter)
flooding/flooding_risk/exposure_6/flood_: 2.4.3) If there is a flooding risk, are there any flood mitigation measures?
flooding/exposure_7/man_made_drainage: 2.5) Are there any manmade drainage systems/culverts on or near the site?
flooding/exposure_8/drainage_system_culv: 2.5.1) If yes, have the drainage systems/culverts ever overflowed/been prone to blockage?
landslide/exposure_9/landslide_risk: 2.6) Is there a landslide risk? (Estimate Quantitative Steepness of slope of the topography of the area. Add visual)
landslide/exposure_10/landslide_history: 2.6.1) If history of landslides, when was the last landslide event? (year BS)
topography/general_terrain: 2.7) What is the general terrain of surrounding area?
topography/exposure_11/general_topograph: 2.8) What is the general topography of the School campus?
surroundings/approx_distance_to_road: 2.9) Approximate distance to main road from entrance to shcool/campus
surroundings/exposure_13/linear_feature: 2.11) Are there any linear features or vertical offsets on the site, which could indicate an active fault/landslide risk? (Qualitative)
physical_planning/number_of_buildings: 3.1)Number of School Buildings (Blocks) on school campus
physical_planning/physical_planning_1/nu: 3.2) Number of Temporary Learning Centers on School campus
physical_planning/physical_planning_2/fu: 3.2.1) Who funded and built the Temporary Learning Centres?
physical_planning/owns_land: 3.3) Who owns the school campus land?
physical_planning/physical_planning_3/sa: 3.4) Is there a safe location outside the buildings where ALL staff and students can currently assemble in an emergency event?
physical_planning/physical_planning_4/sa: 3.5) Excluding safe assembly location is there any additional space for Temporary Learning Centers on the school campus?
physical_planning/physical_planning_6/wa: 3.8) Are there WASH facilities available? If so, what condition are they in?
physical_planning/water_tanks: 3.9) Is there safe drinking water available on site?
physical_planning/physical_planning_7/el: 3.10) Is the school connected to electricity suppy?
physical_planning/physical_planning_8/ba: 3.11) Does the school have backup power?
physical_planning/physical_planning_9/ex: 3.12) How many exit points are there for people to evacuate the site on foot?
physical_planning/physical_planning_10/p: 3.14) Is there proximity to unsafe structures, such as, perimeter walls, water towers, trees, generators and potentially damaging debris?
